                display: none;
            }
            .image-container img {
                image-rendering: unset;
            }
            .collection-url p{
                margin: 0;
                font-size: 70%;
               
                }

                   width: 35px;
                       height: 35px;
               
                       }

                   left: 3px;
               }

        right: 5px;
    }

               }

<div class="hero-section1-content text-center px-2">
<p class="Introducing">Introducing</p>
<!-- <h2 class="heading-content">Sierra Living Concepts</h2> -->
<div><img src="/images/uploaded/logo-seirra.png" /></div>
<h2 class="heading-content">X</h2>
<h2 class="heading-content">LAUREN ANDRESKY</h2>
<p class="description-content">Partnering with Sierra Living Concepts is an exciting project for me, as an Interior Designer who values opportunities for clients to customize their furniture to achieve a one-of-a-kind result. SLC’s exquisite selection of solid wood pieces ensures a long-lasting product for clients who seek more from their furniture than mass-produced alternatives. This unwavering commitment to quality craftsmanship, sustainability, and customization distinguishes Sierra Living Concepts from other furniture manufacturers in the market.</p>
<a href="#filters"><button class="btn btn-light shop-button">Shop the Collection</button></a></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="row Bedroom-heading-setting">
<div class="col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-12 Bedroom-heading-content">
<h2 class="Bedroom-heading">Bedroom</h2>
<p class="Bedroom-heading-description">Solid wood bedroom furniture offers lasting warmth and elegance—rich grain, sturdy construction, and refined finishes create a cozy, timeless retreat.</p>

</div>
<div class="background-side-setting mv1">

<div class="divider-list"></div>
<div class="row m-0">
<div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12 p-0 mobile-padd">
<h3 class="sesigner-suggestion pb-3">Designer’s Suggestions</h3>
<p class="selecting-furniture1 pb-3 m-0">When selecting furniture for your home, it’s important to strike a balance between style, functionality, and comfort. Here are some expert tips to help guide your decisions:</p>
<ul class="selecting-furniture2 pb-2">
<li class="pb-3"><strong>Start with function:</strong> Before falling for a pretty piece, think about how you’ll actually use the space. The best furniture makes your daily life easier and better-looking.</li>
<li class="pb-3"><strong>Mix, don’t match:</strong> Layering different styles, textures, and finishes keeps a space feeling curated—not cookie-cutter. Just keep one or two elements consistent to tie it all together.</li>
<li class="pb-3"><strong>Scale matters:</strong> Make sure your furniture fits the room. Oversized pieces can overwhelm, while too-small ones get lost. Always measure (and double check the delivery path).</li>
<li class="pb-3"><strong>Invest in feel-good pieces:</strong> Whether it’s the comfiest chair or a table that makes you want to host dinner parties, pick items that make you feel something.</li>
<li class="pb-3"><strong>Let your home reflect you:</strong> Trends come and go, but your space should tell your story. Choose what you genuinely love, not just what’s trending.</li>
</ul>
<a href="javascript:void(0);" class="show-more">Show More</a></div>
</div>
<div class="background-side-setting">
<div><img src="/images/uploaded/Designer_Bottom_Image_1.jpg" class="w-100" /></div>
<div class="background-stting4">
<p class="background-stting4-content2">About Me <br /><br />Hi! I’m Hannah Go, an interior and product designer based in Los Angeles with nearly a decade of experience working across residential, retail, and experiential spaces. I run my own studio, Studio Hanego, where I focus on creating interiors that feel layered, lived-in, and full of intention. My strength lies in mixing the refined with the offbeat—pairing timeless forms with unexpected textures, vintage finds, and community-sourced pieces. I’m a big believer that good design should be both functional and deeply personal. Outside of client work, I’m also a mixed media and ceramics artist, which heavily influences how I approach materials and composition in interiors. I love a space that tells a story—and ideally, has a sense of humor too.</p>
<ul class="social-landing">
<li><a href="https://www.instagram.com/studiohanego?utm_source=lauren_andresky" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> <img src="/images/uploaded/Interest.svg" /> </a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.studiohanego.com?utm_source=lauren_andresky" target="_blank" rel="noopener"> <img src="/images/uploaded/web.svg" /> </a></li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>

<div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12">

                    ]
                }
                imageMapResize();
                $('body').on('click', '.category-btn button', function (e) {
    
                    if (e.target.tagName != 'SPAN' && !$(this).hasClass('active-link')) {
    
                        $('.show-by-room a, .category-btn button').removeClass('active-link'); // Remove from all
                        var buttonId = $(this).attr('id');
                        var matchInRoom = $('.category-btn').find('#' + buttonId);
                        if (matchInRoom.length > 0) {
                            matchInRoom.addClass('active-link');
                        }
                        console.log(buttonId, 'buton id');
                        var matchInRoom = $('.show-by-room').find('#' + buttonId);
                        if (matchInRoom.length > 0) {
                            matchInRoom.addClass('active-link');
                        }
                        $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link');
                        var matchInRoom = $('.show-by-style #' + buttonId).addClass('active-link');
    
                        show_template();
                    }
                });
                $('body').on('click', '.show-by-room a', function (e) {
    
                    if (e.target.tagName != 'SPAN') {
                         $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link');               
                        $('.show-by-room a, .category-btn button').removeClass('active-link'); // Remove from all
                        var buttonId = $(this).attr('id');
                        var matchInRoom = $('.category-btn').find('#' + buttonId);
                        if (matchInRoom.length > 0) {
                            matchInRoom.addClass('active-link');
                        }
                        console.log(buttonId, 'buton id');
                        var matchInRoom = $('.show-by-room').find('#' + buttonId);
                        if (matchInRoom.length > 0) {
                            matchInRoom.addClass('active-link');
                        }
    
                        var matchInRoom = $('.show-by-style #' + buttonId).addClass('active-link');
    
                        show_template();
                    }
                });
                $('.show-by-style a').click(function (e) {
                 $('.show-by-room a').removeClass('active-link');  
    
                    $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link'); // Remove from all
                    $(this).addClass('active-link');
                    show_template();
                });
                $('body').on('click', '.category-btn span', function (e) {
    
                    var attr_id = $(this).parent().attr('id');
                    $(this).removeClass('active-link');
                    $('.show-by-room #' + attr_id).removeClass('active-link');
                    $('.show-by-style #' + attr_id).removeClass('active-link');
                    show_template();
    
                });
                    let hideTimeout;
            var templatechnage=false; 
                $('body').on('click touchstart mouseenter', 'area.collection', function (e) {
                    clearTimeout(hideTimeout); // cancel hide if moving between area and box
                                        
                    var coords = $(this).attr('coords').split(',');
                     var link = $(this).attr('href');
                    var x1 = parseInt(coords[0], 10);
                    var y1 = parseInt(coords[1], 10);
                    var x2 = parseInt(coords[2], 10);
                    var y2 = parseInt(coords[3], 10);
                      console.log(x1,y1,x2,y2);                      
                    var height = y2 - y1;
                var width = x2 - x1;
                var $container = $(this).closest('.image-container');
        var $collection_url = $container.find('.collection-url');
        var $collection_url_img = $collection_url.find('img');
    
        $collection_url.find('a').attr('href', link);
          if($('body').width() < 767){
            var img_width =  $container.find('.mobile').width();
            var parent_width = $(this).closest('.image-container').width(); // ← same as img_width
            var margin_left = Math.abs((img_width - parent_width) / 2);                  
         x1=x1+margin_left;
         console.log(margin_left,img_width,parent_width,(img_width - parent_width),'left');
                                    }
        $collection_url.css({
            left: (x1 + width) + 'px',
            top: y1 + 'px',
            display: 'flex',
            height: height + 'px'
        });
    
        if ($('body').width() < 767) {
            $collection_url_img.css({
                width: width + 'px',
                height: height + 'px',
                minHeight: height + 'px',
            });
        }
                });
    
                // mouse leaves the image → maybe hide after short delay
                     $('body').on('mouseenter', 'img[usemap]', function (e) {
               
                    hideTimeout = setTimeout(function () {
                        // check if mouse is over .collection-url
                        if (!$('.collection-url:hover').length) {
                            $('.collection-url').hide();
                        }
                    }, 100); // small delay so user can move mouse to the box
                });
    
                  $('body').on('mouseenter', '.collection-url', function (e) {
                // cancel hide if mouse enters the box
                    clearTimeout(hideTimeout);
                });
    $('body').on('mouseleave', '.collection-url', function (e) {
                // hide if mouse leaves the box too
               
                    $('.collection-url').hide();
                });
                                           
                $('body').on('click', '.clear-all', function (e) {
                    $('.show-by-room a').removeClass('active-link');
                    $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link');
                    show_template();
    
                });
                 function show_template() {
                 templatechnage=true;
                    // Determine the selected category and style
                    var selected_category = $('.show-by-room a.active-link').attr('id') || '';
                    var selected_style = $('.show-by-style a.active-link').attr('id') || '';
                    var template_name = '';
    
                    if (selected_category && selected_style) {
                        template_name = selected_category + '/' + selected_style;
                    } else if (selected_category) {
                        template_name = selected_category;
                    } else if (selected_style) {
                        template_name = selected_style;
                    }
                        console.log(template_name);
                    // Find the matching template configuration
                    var matchedTemplate = configuration.Filters.find(function (template) {
                        return template.Name === template_name;
                    });
                    if (matchedTemplate) {
                        $('.select-container.bed-room').hide();
                        var templateId = matchedTemplate.templateid;
                        var $template = $('.select-container[data-templateid="' + templateId + '"]');
    
                        if ($template.length) {
                            var $clonedTemplate = $template.clone().removeClass('d-none');
    
                            $clonedTemplate.find('.clear-all').hide();
                            var $categoryBtn = $clonedTemplate.find('.category-btn');
    
                            if ($categoryBtn.length) {
                                var $originalButton = $categoryBtn.find('button').first();
                                var $buttonTemplate = $originalButton.clone();
                                $categoryBtn.empty();
                                var $filter_element = '';
    
                                if (selected_category != '' && selected_style == '') {
                                    $filter_element = '.show-by-room li a';
                                } else if (selected_style != '' && selected_category == '') {
                                    $filter_element = '.show-by-style li a';
                                } else {
                                    $clonedTemplate.find('.clear-all').show();
                                    $filter_element = '.show-by-style li a.active-link,.show-by-room li a.active-link';
    
                                }
                                $($filter_element).each(function () {
                                    var itemText = $(this).text().trim(); // Get the text content
                                    var itemId = $(this).attr('id'); // Get the id attribute
                                    if (itemText) {
                                        // Clone the button template
                                        var $newButton = $buttonTemplate.clone();
    
                                        // Update the text content of the cloned button without altering its internal structure
                                        $newButton.contents().filter(function () {
                                            return this.nodeType === 3; // Node type 3 is a text node
                                        }).first().replaceWith(itemText + ' ');
    
                                        // Set the id of the cloned button to match the id of the corresponding <a> tag
                                        if (itemId) {
                                            $newButton.attr('id', itemId);
                                            $newButton.removeClass('active-link');
                                            if (itemId == selected_category || itemId == selected_style) {
                                                $newButton.addClass('active-link');
                                            }
                                        }
    
                                        // Append the modified button to the category-btn container
                                        $categoryBtn.append($newButton);
                                    }
                                });
                            }
    
                            // Replace tokens in the template HTML
                            var html = $clonedTemplate[0].outerHTML;
                            // Replace top-level tokens
    
                            
                            $(html).find('.select-container').removeAttr('data-templateid');
                            html = html.replace(/#Heading#/g, matchedTemplate.Heading || '');
                            html = html.replace(/#description#/g, matchedTemplate.description || '');
    
                            
                            // Handle section1 tokens
    
                            if (matchedTemplate.Sections && matchedTemplate.Sections.length > 0) {
                                var section1 = matchedTemplate.Sections[0];
                               
                                html = html.replace(/#section1\.Heading#/g, section1.Heading || '');
                                html = html.replace(/#section1\.subheading#/g, section1.subheading || '');
    
                                // Handle section2 tokens based on template structure
                                if (templateId === 1 && section1.section2) {
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.image_src#/g, section1.section2.image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.image_hover_src#/g, section1.section2.image_hover_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.mobile_image_src#/g, section1.section2.mobile_image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.mobile_hover_image#/g, section1.section2.mobile_hover_image || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.alt#/g, section1.section2.alt || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.tags#/g, section1.section2.tags || '');
                                       html = html.replace(/#section2\.mobile_tags#/g, section1.section2.mobile_tags || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.title#/g, section1.section2.title || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.description#/g, section1.section2.description || '');
                                }
    
                                // Template 2 & 3 have different section2 structure with subsections
                                if ((templateId === 2 || templateId === 3) &&
                                    matchedTemplate.Sections[0].section2 &&
                                    Array.isArray(matchedTemplate.Sections[0].section2)) {
    
                                    var subsection1 = matchedTemplate.Sections[0].section2[0] || {};
                                    var subsection2 = matchedTemplate.Sections[0].section2[1] || {};
    
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.title#/g, subsection1.title || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.description#/g, subsection1.description || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.image_src#/g, subsection1.image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.image_hover_src#/g, subsection1.image_hover_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.mobile_image_src#/g, subsection1.mobile_image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.mobile_hover_image#/g, subsection1.mobile_hover_image || '');
    
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.alt#/g, subsection1.alt || '');
                                     html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.tags#/g, subsection1.tags || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.mobile_tags#/g, subsection1.mobile_tags || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.price#/g, subsection1.price || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.product_link#/g, subsection1.product_link || '');
    
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.title#/g, subsection2.title || '');
                                       html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.tags#/g, subsection2.tags || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.description#/g, subsection2.description || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.image_src#/g, subsection2.image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.image_hover_src#/g, subsection2.image_hover_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.mobile_image_src#/g, subsection2.mobile_image_src || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.mobile_hover_image#/g, subsection2.mobile_hover_image || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.alt#/g, subsection2.alt || '');
                                      html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.mobile_tags#/g, subsection2.mobile_tags || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.price#/g, subsection2.price || '');
                                     html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection1\.product_link#/g, subsection2.product_link || '');
                                    html = html.replace(/#section2\.subsection2\.product_link#/g, subsection2.product_link || '');
                                }
    
                                // Handle section3 tokens
                                if (matchedTemplate.Sections.length > 1) {
                                    if (templateId === 1 && matchedTemplate.Sections[1].sections3) {
    
                                        
                                        var sections3 = matchedTemplate.Sections[1].sections3;
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.description#/g, sections3[0].description || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.title#/g, sections3[0].title || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.image_src#/g, sections3[1].image_src || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.image_hover_src#/g, sections3[1].image_hover_src || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.mobile_image_src#/g, sections3[1].mobile_image_src || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.mobile_hover_image#/g, sections3[1].mobile_hover_image || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.alt#/g, sections3[1].alt || '');
                                       
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.tags#/g, sections3[1].tags || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#sections3\.mobile_tags#/g, sections3[1].mobile_tags || '');
                                    } else if (templateId === 2 && matchedTemplate.Sections[1].sections3) {
                                    
                                        var sections3 = matchedTemplate.Sections[1].sections3;
                                         console.log(sections3[0].image_src,'safsdgg');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.title#/g, sections3[0].title || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.description#/g, sections3[0].description || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.image_src#/g, sections3[0].image_src || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.image_hover_src#/g, sections3[0].image_hover_src || '');
                                          html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.tags#/g, sections3[0].tags || '');
                                           html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.mobile_tags#/g, sections3[0].mobile_tags || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.mobile_image_src#/g, sections3[0].mobile_image_src || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.mobile_hover_image#/g, sections3[0].mobile_hover_image || '');
    
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.alt#/g, sections3[0].alt || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.description#/g, sections3[1].description || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.title#/g, sections3[1].title || '');
                                    } else if (templateId === 3) {
                                        // For template 3, sections are structured differently
                                        var section3 = matchedTemplate.Sections[1];
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.description#/g, section3.description || '');
                                        html = html.replace(/#section3\.title#/g, section3.title || '');
    
                                        // Handle section 4 if it exists
                                        if (matchedTemplate.Sections.length > 2 &&
                                            matchedTemplate.Sections[2].sections4 &&
                                            matchedTemplate.Sections[2].sections4.length > 0) {
    
                                            var section4 = matchedTemplate.Sections[2].sections4[0];
                                            html = html.replace(/#section3\.heading#/g, section4.heading || '');
    
                                            if (section4.sections && section4.sections.length > 0) {
                                                var subsection1 = section4.sections[0];
                                                var subsection2 = section4.sections[1];
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.title#/g, subsection1.title || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.image_src#/g, subsection1.image_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.image_hover_src#/g, subsection1.image_hover_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.mobile_image_src#/g, subsection1.mobile_image_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.mobile_hover_image#/g, subsection1.mobile_hover_image || '');
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.alt#/g, subsection1.alt || '');
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.price#/g, subsection1.price || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection1\.product_link#/g, subsection1.product_link || '');
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.title#/g, subsection2.title || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.image_src#/g, subsection2.image_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.image_hover_src#/g, subsection2.image_hover_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.mobile_image_src#/g, subsection2.mobile_image_src || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.mobile_hover_image#/g, subsection2.mobile_hover_image || '');
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.alt#/g, subsection2.alt || '');
    
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.price#/g, subsection2.price || '');
                                                html = html.replace(/#section3\.subsection2\.product_link#/g, subsection2.product_link || '');
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
    
                            // Set the updated HTML
                            $('.template_container').empty().html(html);
                            $('.template_container .select-container').removeAttr('data-templateid');
                        } else {
    
    
                            $('.select-container.bed-room').show();
                            $('.template_container').empty();
                            $('.category-btn button').removeClass('active-link');
                            $('.show-by-room a').removeClass('active-link');
                            $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link');
                            $('.Bedroom-heading-setting .category-btn #bed-room').addClass('active-link');
                            //$('.show-by-room #bed-room').addClass('active-link');
                        }
                    } else {
    
                        $('.select-container.bed-room').show();
                        $('.template_container').empty();
                        $('.category-btn button').removeClass('active-link');
                        $('.show-by-room a').removeClass('active-link');
                        $('.show-by-style a').removeClass('active-link');
                        $('.Bedroom-heading-setting .category-btn #bed-room').addClass('active-link');
                        //$('.show-by-room #bed-room').addClass('active-link');
                        console.log("Configuration not found for:", template_name);
                    }
                    if($('.show-by-room').find('.active-link').length>0){
                        $('.dropdown1 ').addClass('active');
                    }else{
                        $('.dropdown1 ').removeClass('active');
                    }
                    
                    console.log($('.show-by-style').find('.active-link').length,'show by style');
                    if($('.show-by-style').find('.active-link').length>0){
                        $('.dropdown2').addClass('active');
                    }else{
                        $('.dropdown2').removeClass('active');
                    }
                }
    $('body').on('mouseenter', '.template_container img, .select-container img', function () {
                    const $img = $(this);
                    const hoverImg = $img.attr('data-hoverimage');
                    if (hoverImg) {
                        $img.attr('src', hoverImg);
                    }
                });
    
                $('body').on('mouseleave', '.template_container img, .select-container img', function () {
                    const $img = $(this);
                    const defaultImg = $img.attr('data-defaultimage');
                    const mapName = $img.attr('usemap')?.replace('#', '');
    
                    // Delay to detect if still hovering on <area>
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        if (!$img.data('isHoveringArea')) {
                            if (defaultImg) {
                                $img.attr('src', defaultImg);
                            }
                        }
                    }, 2);
                });
    
                // Delegate hover events on <area> tags too
                $('body').on('mouseenter', 'map area', function () {
                    const $map = $(this).closest('map');
                    const mapName = $map.attr('name');
                    const $img = $('img[usemap="#' + mapName + '"]');
                    $img.data('isHoveringArea', true);
                });
    
                $('body').on('mouseleave', 'map area', function () {
                    const $map = $(this).closest('map');
                    const mapName = $map.attr('name');
                    const $img = $('img[usemap="#' + mapName + '"]');
                    $img.data('isHoveringArea', false);
    
                    const defaultImg = $img.attr('data-defaultimage');
                    if (defaultImg) {
                        $img.attr('src', defaultImg);
                    }
                });
    
    
    function resizeMap() {
      var img = $('img')[0];
      if (!img.complete) return;
    
      var width = img.naturalWidth;
      var currentWidth = img.clientWidth;
      var scale = currentWidth / width;
    
      $('map area').each(function () {
        var coords = $(this).attr('coords').split(',');
        var newCoords = coords.map(function (coord) {
          return Math.round(parseInt(coord) * scale);
        });
        $(this).attr('coords', newCoords.join(','));
      });
    }
    
    $(window).on('load resize', resizeMap);
    
      
                $(".show-more").click(function () {
                    $(".more-text").toggle(); // Show or hide the extra text
    
                    // Toggle active class on the button
                    $('.selecting-furniture2 li').toggleClass('active');
                    $(this).toggleClass("active");
                    // Toggle button text
                    $(this).text($(this).hasClass("active") ? "Show Less" : "Show More");
                });
            })
    
    
    
    
             
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
        </script>
</p>
</div>
